name: 施陽正
objective: 本課程主要是教導學生在熱流學領域上的基本知識，課程內容主要包括: 1. 熱力特性簡介， 2. 熱力學基本定律， 3. 基本冷凍空調循環， 4. 流體特性簡介， 5. 柏努利方程式， 6. 管內與管外流， 7. 穩態與暫態熱傳分析， 8. 散熱片之熱傳分析， 9. 強制對流分析， 10. 自然對流分析， 11. 具相變化的熱對流: 凝結與沸騰。
schedule:
1                         Course outline & Fluid Mechanics (1):  Fundamentals &
2                         Fluid Mechanics (1): Fluid Statics
3                         Fluid Mechanics (2): Bernoulli Equation, I
4                         Fluid Mechanics (3): Bernoulli Equation, II
5                         Fluid Mechanics (4): Viscous Flow in Pipes
6                         Fluid Mechanics (5): Fluid Kinematics
6                         Fluid Mechanics (6): Reynolds Transport Theorem (RTT), I
7                         Fluid Mechanics (7): Reynolds Transport Theorem (RTT), II
8                         Fluid Mechanics (8): Flow over Bodies: Drag and Lift                
9                         Mid-term Exam
10                       Heat Transfer (1): Fundamentals & Energy Conservation
11                       Heat Transfer (2): Conduction, I: Steady State
12                       Heat Transfer (3): Conduction, II: Extended Surfaces
13                       Heat Transfer (4): Conduction, III: Transient State
14                       Heat Transfer (5): Convection, I: Introduction
15                       Heat Transfer (6): Convection, II: External Flow
16                       Heat Transfer (7): Convection, III: Internal Flow
17                       Heat Transfer (8): Convection: Natural Convection
18                       Final Exam
